overview.title: Overview
overview.content: PlayfulOutings is a comprehensive web platform dedicated to providing fun and engaging games for all age groups. The website serves as a one-stop destination for indoor and outdoor games, helping users discover, filter, and learn about various games for different occasions and demographics.

objectives.title: Project Objectives
items: Create a user-friendly platform for game discovery and learning
Provide detailed game instructions and materials required
Offer filtering options for different game categories
Ensure responsive design for all devices
Deliver engaging user experience with smooth navigation
